grammarNote.title: の and こと (final chapter)
grammarNote.explanation:
思い出すのが楽しいね — remembering is fun. ふざけるのはやめて — stop fooling around. The same のは/のが patterns that have run through twenty chapters.

この春の物語はみんなのものだ — this spring story belongs to everyone. の connects spring to story, and everyone to belonging.

You have read 45 chapters. Every grammar pattern in this reader now lives in your reading memory. Trust it.
